predicate.note: Frames file for 'discomfit' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1, Framenet entry Experiencer obj.

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: Well, it now turns out that Mrs. Thatcher had to travel across the globe to the 49-member Commonwealth summit in Kuala Lumpur *trace* to discomfit the Holy Order of Consensus Builders.
example.arg: the Holy Order of Consensus Builders
